snippet: French forces destroyed a convoy linked to the terrorist group Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb that was transporting weapons from Libya to Mali, the office of France’s president said.
abstract: French forces destroy a convoy in Niger linked to the terrorist group Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb; group was transporting weapons from Libya to Mali.
lead_paragraph: French forces destroyed a convoy linked to the terrorist group Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb that was transporting weapons from Libya to Mali, the office of France’s president said.

headline.main: Niger: French Strike a Qaeda Convoy
headline.print_headline: Niger: French Strike a Qaeda Convoy
